scripts.preinstall: gem install jekyll && npm update -g bower && bower update
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-scripts && npm run build-styles && npm run copy-images && npm run copy-favicon && npm run build-jekyll
scripts.build-scripts: uglifyjs src/assets/js/**/*.js --beautify -o dist/assets/js/yoshino-ui-core.js && npm run copy-scripts
scripts.build-styles: lessc src/assets/less/index.less dist/assets/css/yoshino-ui-core.css --source-map-map-inline && postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' dist/assets/css/yoshino-ui-core.css -o dist/assets/css/yoshino-ui-core.css
scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist && npm run clean-docs
scripts.clean-dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/assets dist/assets/audio dist/assets/css dist/assets/img dist/assets/js
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run deploy-scripts && npm run deploy-styles && npm run compress-styles && npm run copy-images && npm run copy-favicon && npm run build-jekyll
scripts.deploy-styles: lessc src/assets/less/index.less dist/assets/css/yoshino-ui-core.css && postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' dist/assets/css/yoshino-ui-core.css -o dist/assets/css/yoshino-ui-core.css
scripts.serve: npm run watch & browser-sync start --server docs/_site --serveStatic dist --files '**/*.js, **/*.css, **/*.html'
scripts.watch: npm run watch-styles & npm run watch-jekyll & npm run watch-scripts
scripts.watch-jekyll: chokidar 'docs/index.md' 'docs/_includes/' 'docs/_layouts/' -c 'cd docs && npm run build-jekyll && browser-sync reload'
